The loop on this face consists of 5 curves in sequence. Create the second face of the sketch with the following curves and loops. * Curve 6: Draw a circle with a center at (0.0469, 0.3281) and a radius of 0.0319. The loop on this face consists of 1 circle. Next, scale the 2D sketch using a scaling parameter of 0.75.
